What are you thankful for this week?: O le a se mea e te faafetai ai mo lenei vaiaso?
What are you struggling with and how can: O a au auala o loo tauivi ma e faapefea ona tatou fesoasoani?
How did you put into practice the script: Na faʻafefea ona e faʻataʻitaʻi le mau / tala na matou suʻesuʻe ai i le taimi mulimuli na matou feiloai ai?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: O ai na e faasoa atu le lesona a le vaiaso talu ai ma le mea na fai?
What needs did you meet in the community: O a ni manaʻoga na e feiloaʻi i le alalafaga i le vaiaso talu ai?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Fai atu i se tasi e faitau le fuaitau tasi palakalafa i le taimi.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Fai atu i se vaega o le vaega o tau atu ia latou lava upu.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Fesili i le kulupu pe na latou faaopoopoina se mea pe tuua se mea.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: A maeʻa uma parakalafa uma, fesili i se tasi i le kulupu e taʻu atu le tala atoa i le manatua. Tuu i le vaega e faasaʻosaʻo ni mea sese.
What does this passage tell us about God: O le a se mea o taʻu mai e lenei mau ia i matou e uiga i le Atua?
What does this passage tell us about peo: O le a le mea o taʻu mai e lenei mau ia i tatou e uiga i tagata?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Afai e moni lenei fuaitau, o fea le amio e tatau ona tatou suia i lenei vaiaso?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: O ai o le ae faamatalaina lenei tala i lenei vaiaso?
What needs can we meet in the community: O a manaʻoga o loʻo mafai ona tatou feiloaʻi ai i totonu o le faʻalapotopotoga i lenei vaiaso?
When do you want to meet again?: O afea e te toe fia feiloai ai?
Discovry Bible Study: Mauaina o Suesuega a le Tusi Paia
Would you like to discover with your fri: E te manaʻo e te iloa ma au uo O le a le Atua e pei o le finagalo o le Atua e te ola ai?
Here are some questions to get your disc: O isi nei o fesili e faʻatino ai lau talanoaga.
Would you like to discover for yourself: E te fia iloa mo oe lava le Atua e pei o le a finagalo le Atua e te ola ai?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Tele o tagata e fiafia e faia nei mea na mauaina i se kulupu ma a latou uo.
